data.title: Sketchy area, amazing view
data.text:
Bad part of Lynn.
Awesome view of Boston.
Lots of stairs.
High wind.
Not really sure when it is open, if at all but I would go back.
Be sure to go with a friend during the day.

data.title: Those Stairs are a Perfect Workout!!
data.text: I bring my dog here for the stairs and the view! Such a great work out going up and down and the view from the top is worth it. Tires us both out and is very pretty. There is also a little play park on the side for the kiddos too.

data.title: Good Photographer spot
data.text: This is a great place to take pics. The stairs can give you the best workout. I got some great shots of the city. The wind was very high because it's a very high elevation.

data.title: Wow it's great to see Boston from here
data.text: A friend had mention that the view from here is breathtaking and I must say it's more then that . I need it to see where I have been living for so long and can say that is a one of a kind place .

data.title: Another hidden gem in Lynn!
data.text: You do not have to climb the many steps to get to the park, but there are quite a few steps inside the observatory. You can drive around and enter the park at the top side. Fantastic views of Lynn, Boston, and the Atlantic ocean.

data.title: See it all
data.text:
You can see the "whole world" said my child. Her world would include the north shore. You can see as far as your eyes allow you. 
It is a nice way to picture the area.  
- no facilities

data.title: "BE CAREFUL"
data.text: The stone tower is interesting to see and the small park around it Is nice. The down side is this is in an area of Lynn that is run down and not to safe. 60 years ago this was a very nice area and very safe it has changed over the years.

data.title: WARNING
data.text: It is beautiful!  We noticed this driving and decided to check it out.  The area around is very unsafe and run down.  The park is heavily used, which is good.  But we found ourselves being cornered on the walk around the tower by two groups of young males and beat a hasty retreat.  Be careful and safe, and I would definitely avoid this area after dark.

data.title: Very spacious, great
data.text: The tower is huge it's great they let you go up to the microscope and see the planets , it is very pretty . The view is amazing from high rock tower you can see all of lynn and the night view leaves you speechless
